中文法規名稱: 危險性行為之範圍標準
沿革內容: 1.Formulated in three articles and announced by the Department of Health, the Executive Yuan, on January 10, 2008, under Shu-Shou-Chi Order No. 0960001319

法規內容.條文內容: This set of criteria is formulated in accordance with regulations of Paragraph 4, Article 21 of the HIV Infection Control and Patient Rights Protection Act.
The scope of unsafe sexual behavior refers to sexual behavior of direct contact without obstruction of organ membranes or body fluid that is assessed medically likely to induce HIV infection.
This set of criteria shall be implemented on the day of announcement.
